name: Revenge of the Poop
description:
Revenge of the Poop is a fun game with funny sounds and groovy music.

You have to clean the room of sewage by firing them from a super cleaning agent "Zamestos". But be careful, the revenge of the poop will be cruel!

2 difficulty levels:

"Die Hard" is for those who are not afraid of difficulties and are ready to suffer, but receive one and a half times more rewards from killing bosses.

"Barbie Mod" - for the rest.

There are 5 boss poop in the game, each boss is stronger and more aggressive than the previous one. Try to kill as many of them as possible.

Features in the game:

-  Double shot, now you can shoot double drops Instead, destroy the evil spirits twice as fast

- Super teleportation ability! If the case is rubbish and poop is everywhere, use teleportation to move to a random place

- Survival mode. There are no bosses here and each new level adds one dull turd, which means work for you. The goal of the mode is to go as far as possible.
